name: X-Plane 11
detailed_description:
Update Notes

X-Plane 11.10 is now available - the first major update to the 11th generation of X-Plane.

The update contains:

  • New aircraft Cessna 172SP G1000 Nav3
  • Landmark scenery for London and Las Vegas
  • Highly detailed airports for Boston and Phoenix
  • Over 500 new airports with 3d scenery
  • G1000 glass cockpit
  • Controller and keyboard profile support
  • More autogen and airport scenery objects for more variety
  • Improvements to loading and saving situations
  • Improvements to flight physics regarding prop wash and ground effect
  • Kiosk mode

For a full list of changes, including the list of all airports and more detailed explanation of the physics changes, see the Release Notes.


About the Game

The future of flight simulation is now.
X-Plane 11 is the detailed, realistic, and modern simulator you’ve been waiting for.


New in X-Plane 11
A completely redesigned, intuitive user interface that makes setting up and editing your flight a breeze.
Consistently usable 3-D cockpits and stunningly high-resolution exterior models for all included aircraft.
A new effects engine for lighting, sounds, and explosions.
Realistic avionics: all planes are IFR-ready right out of the gate.
Busy, “living” airports with pushback tugs and roaming fuel trucks, able to service both your aircraft and the simulator’s AI planes.
New buildings & roads to better simulate European cities
…and more!

short_description:
The future of flight simulation is now!
X-Plane 11 is the detailed, realistic, and modern simulator you’ve been waiting for. Intuitive user interface, 3-D cockpits, new effects, 3-D sound, living airports and world-wide scenery.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
reviews:
“The New X-Plane Flight Sim Is So Ridiculously Detailed, It Even Has Catering Trucks”
https://www.wired.com/2017/02/new-x-plane-flight-sim-ridiculously-detailed-even-catering-trucks/

“I believe Laminar Research are on to a real winner with X-Plane 11”
http://www.flightsim.com/vbfs/content.php?17026-X-Plane-11-Preview/

“Xplane11 è veramente incredibile, ed è sicuramente il futuro dei simulatori di volo.”
Gamers Paradise (in Italian)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, or 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, i5, or i7 CPU with 2 or more cores, or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11-capable video card from NVIDIA or AMD w/512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: The disk requirements are based on how many world scenery areas are downloaded. Minimum with one scenery area is 20 GB . Additional scenery areas can be downloaded at no charge at any time after purchase
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, or 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K at 3.5 ghz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12-capable video card from NVIDIA or AMD w/4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 65 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: The disk requirements are based on how many world scenery areas are downloaded. Minimum with one scenery area is 20 GB . Additional scenery areas can be downloaded at no charge at any time after purchase
